physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Initially presented with cognitive impairment and delusions of jealousy, ataxia, and mild incontinence.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: After ventriculostomy, ataxia and mild incontinence improved; however, the jealous delusions persisted.

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No significant vital signs reported during follow-up assessment; cognitive impairment persisted.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No change in neurological or mental status observed during follow-up evaluation 8 months after discharge.
